text: well if they want to use deep
reinforcement learning in games i think
so the first advice is to start to learn
deep reinforcement learning but there is
also a lot of library that can use and i
think the best is to use unity they have
something called ml agents that allows
you you know to create your game and
then to train your agent on the game you
created for now in video games industry
what can be done with deep reinforcement
learning is mostly testing the game so
it means you know trying having an agent
that will try every part of the
environment
but i'm pretty sure that in the future
we'll have ai in games that will be made
with deep reinforcement learning for now
it's not the case we don't have
published games who use it
but i really think that you know in the
next year it will be the case but there
is still some you know drawbacks
